admin.confirmBulkDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the selected questions?

questions.title: Question Bank
questions.subtitle: Manage all questions in the system

form.question: Question
form.questionPlaceholder: Enter the question text (LaTeX supported with $...$)
form.tagPlaceholder: Add a tag and press Enter
form.latexHint: Tip: Use $...$ for inline math and $$...$$ for display math

messages.noQuestionsDesc: No questions match your current filters. Try adjusting your search or add a new question.

hero.title: Master Math with
hero.subtitle: AI-powered exercises, handwork verification, and gamification to help you ace your math and physics courses.

step1.title: Choose Your Exercises
step1.desc: Select 1-10 exercises per day and pick your courses. Customize your daily practice routine.

step2.title: Practice Daily
step2.desc: Solve problems on paper, then upload your handwork for AI verification or self-mark.

step3.title: Track & Level Up
step3.desc: Earn XP, maintain streaks, and climb levels as you master new concepts.

daily.title: Daily Exercises
daily.desc: Fresh AI-generated problems delivered every day to keep your skills sharp.

ai.title: AI-Generated Content
ai.desc: Questions, solutions, and tips powered by advanced AI for quality content.

handwork.title: Handwork Verification
handwork.desc: Upload photos of your handwritten solutions for instant AI analysis.

xp.title: XP & Levels
xp.desc: Earn experience points and progress through 10 levels as you learn.

streak.title: Streak System
streak.desc: Build daily habits with streaks and bonus XP for consistency.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.desc: Full Hebrew and English support with RTL interface.

testimonials.title: Don't Just Take Our Word For It

0.text: DailyMath helped me ace my Calculus exam! The daily practice routine made all the difference.

1.text: The streak system keeps me motivated every day. I haven't missed a practice session in 30 days!

2.text: Finally understand derivatives thanks to the AI feedback on my handwritten solutions.

3.text: The XP and leveling system makes practicing feel like a game. Highly recommended!

4.text: Love the Hebrew support. It's perfect for Israeli students like me.

5.text: The AI-generated questions are challenging but fair. Great for exam prep!

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free, upgrade when you're ready for more features.

cta.title: Ready to Master Math?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of students improving their grades with daily practice.

homework.title: Homework
homework.subtitle: Upload homework files and get AI-powered solutions
homework.uploadDescription: Upload a PDF or image of your homework and AI will analyze and solve all questions
homework.titleHelper: Give your homework a name to find it easily later
homework.orClickToSelect: or click to select a file
homework.processingDescription: AI is extracting questions from your homework. This usually takes just a few seconds.
homework.uploadSuccessDescription: Questions extracted! Click 'Get Solution' on any question to have AI solve it.
homework.noHomeworksDescription: Upload your first homework PDF to get AI-powered solutions for all questions.
homework.question: Question
homework.generateIllustrationsDesc: Create physics/math diagrams for each question (takes longer)
homework.notFoundDescription: The homework you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deleted.
homework.allCompleteMessage: You've viewed all solutions and earned {xp} XP!
homework.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.

errors.invalidFileType: Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, WebP
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process homework. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome to DailyMath!
welcome.subtitle: Build your math skills with personalized daily practice. Let's set up your learning journey.
welcome.feature2Desc: Get hints that guide you to the answer
welcome.feature3Desc: Watch your skills grow over time

experience.title: What's your algebra experience?
experience.subtitle: This helps us personalize your starting point

beginner.title: Just Starting
beginner.description: New to algebra or need to start from basics

some.title: Some Experience
some.description: Know the basics but need more practice

comfortable.title: Comfortable
comfortable.description: Can solve most problems with some effort

diagnostic.title: Quick Assessment
diagnostic.subtitle: Answer a few questions to find your starting level

results.title: Your Results
results.excellent: Excellent! You have a strong foundation.
results.good: Great work! You're on a good path.
results.developing: Good start! We'll help you improve.
results.starting: No worries! We'll start from the basics.
results.recommendationText: Based on your results, we recommend starting with {topic}.
